    HttpStatus
    Represents common HTTP status codes, each with a numeric code and descriptive reason phrase.
  • Classes in ca.jolt.http used by ca.jolt.http
    Class
    Description
    HttpMethod
    An enumeration representing the standard HTTP methods used in web requests.
    HttpStatus
    Represents common HTTP status codes, each with a numeric code and descriptive reason phrase.
    HttpStatus.StatusCategory
    A categorization of HTTP status codes, indicating the general type of response.
    RequestBuilder
    A builder class for constructing and executing HTTP requests using Java's HttpClient.
    Response
    Represents an HTTP response received from a request made via RequestBuilder.
